## Load Libraries

```{r}
library(here)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)


theme_set(
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
        strip.text = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"))
)
```
